This movie is based on the novel written by Mark Twain in 1875. The story revolves around a young boy named Tom Sawyer, who lives in the fictional town of St. Petersburg, Florida, United States.

Tom Sawyer is a fun-loving and adventurous young boy. He loves spending time with his friends, playing games, going on adventures, exploring new places, and experiencing new things.

Tom Sawyer is also known for his mischievous behavior and his love for pranks and practical jokes.
